010package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
011
012/**
013 * Enumeration compiling selected illuminants and the associated coordinates
014 * in CIE-XYZ color space.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 *
018 */
019public enum Illuminant {
020        /** Equal energy illuminant (5400K). */
021        E       (1/3.0, 1/3.0),                                         // 5400K, Equal energy (x = y = 1/3)
022        /** D50 standard illuminant (5000K). */
023        D50     (0.964296, 1.00000, 0.825100),          // 5000K
024        /** D55 standard illuminant (5500K). */
025        D55 (0.33411, 0.34877),                                 // 5500K
026        /** D65 standard illuminant used for television and sRGB color space (6500K). */
027        D65 (0.950456, 1.00000, 1.088754),              // 6500K, Television, sRGB color space
028        /** D75 standard illuminant (7500K). */
029        D75 (0.29968, 0.31740),                                 // 7500K
030        /** Incandescent tungsten (2856K). */
031        A       (0.45117, 0.40594),                                     // 2856K, Incandescent tungsten
032        /** Obsolete, direct sunlight at noon (4874K). */
033        B       (0.3498, 0.3527),                                       // 4874K, Obsolete, direct sunlight at noon
034        /** Obsolete, north sky daylight (6774K). */
035        C       (0.31039, 0.31905),                                     // 6774K, Obsolete, north sky daylight 
036        /** Cool White Fluorescent CWF (4200K). */
037        F2      (0.37928, 0.36723),                                     // 4200K, Cool White Fluorescent (CWF)
038        /** Broad-Band Daylight Fluorescent (6500K). */
039        F7      (0.31565, 0.32951),                                     // 6500K, Broad-Band Daylight Fluorescent 
040        /** Narrow Band White Fluorescent (4000K). */
041        F11     (0.38543, 0.37110);                                     // 4000K, Narrow Band White Fluorescent 
042        
043        private final double X, Y, Z;
044        
045        private Illuminant(double X, double Y, double Z) {
046                this.X = X; this.Y = Y; this.Z = Z;
047        }
048        
049        private Illuminant(double x, double y) {
050                Y = 1.0;
051                X = x * Y / y; 
052                Z = (1.0 - x - y) * Y / y;
053        }
054        
055        // ----------------------------------------------
056
057        /**
058         * Returns the illuminant's X-coordinate in CIE-XYZ color space.
059         * @return the X-coordinate
060         */
061        public double getX() {
062                return X;
063        }
064
065        /**
066         * Returns the illuminant's Y-coordinate in CIE-XYZ color space.
067         * @return the Y-coordinate
068         */
069        public double getY() {
070                return Y;
071        }
072
073        /**
074         * Returns the illuminant's Z-coordinate in CIE-XYZ color space.
075         * @return the Z-coordinate
076         */
077        public double getZ() {
078                return Z;
079        }
080
081        /**
082         * Returns the illuminant's coordinate in CIE-XYZ color space.
083         * @return the XYZ-coordinate
084         */
085        public double[] getXYZ() {
086                return new double[] {X, Y, Z};
087        }
088        
089}
